description:
After stopping a restaurant robbery, Yahiko`s boastfulness lands him in trouble with Kenshin`s old foe, Gohei Hiruma. And once Yahiko agrees to a fight, Gohei uses the opportunity to steal Samurai X`s Reverse Edged Sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koş Yahiko! Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıcı Ele Geçir
